title: The fetch() Function
description: This video is client-side only and covers the web fetch() API, loading image data and focusing on handling asynchronous events with Promises (async / await).

codeExamples.title: Fetch Image
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of fetching data from an image file

codeExamples.title: Fetch Text
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of fetching data from a text file

codeExamples.title: Fetch Array of Images
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of fetching multiple image files
